instructions: Process ice cream, milk, SPLENDA(R) Granulated Sweetener, and KOOL-AID(r) Soft Drink Mix in a blender until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 pint no-sugar-added light vanilla ice cream
1/4 cup SPLENDA® No Calorie Sweetener, Granulated
1 (0.13 ounce) package KOOL-AID® Unsweetened Lemon-Lime Flavored Drink Mix
title: Lemon Lime KOOL-AID® Milk Shake
